fr.sorbonne_u.cps.sron.plugins

Class SRONNodePlugin

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.sorbonne_u.components.AbstractPlugin
      • fr.sorbonne_u.cps.sron.plugins.SRONNodePlugin
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    fr.sorbonne_u.components.PluginI, ManagementI, MessagingI, java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DiffusionNodePlugin, ElectionNodePlugin

    public abstract class SRONNodePlugin
extends fr.sorbonne_u.components.AbstractPlugin
implements ManagementI, MessagingI
    The class SRONNodePlugin implements a plug-in that creates a ring overlay network over a set of components.

    Description

    Implementation Invariants

     invariant       true        // no more invariant

    Invariants

     invariant       true        // no more invariant

    Created on : 2019-04-08

    Author:
    Jacques Malenfant
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      Modifier and Type Field and Description

      index of the pool of threads created on the owner component to execute the overlay network methods as tasks.

      network services inbound port connected to the previous node.

      URI of the pool of threads created on the owner component to execute the overlay network methods as tasks.

      a reflection outbound port used when adding a new next node after the current one in the ring.

      Constructor and Description
      SRONNodePlugin(int nbThreads)
      create a new overlay network plug-in instance which will create and use a pool of threads on the owner component with the given number of threads.

      broadcast the message over the ring overlay network.

      connect the current node as the first in the ring i.e., its node services outbound port is connected to its inbound port.

      connect the node component with the given reflection inbound port URI as the new next node in the ring.

      • SRONNodePlugin

        public SRONNodePlugin(int nbThreads)
        create a new overlay network plug-in instance which will create and use a pool of threads on the owner component with the given number of threads.

        Contract

         pre     nbThreads > 0
 post    true        // no postcondition.
        Parameters:
        nbThreads - number of threads in the pool that will execute the plug-in methods.

      • isMarked

        protected boolean isMarked(StandardMessage m)
        return true if the message has been marked by this node.

        When a message enters the ring, the first node marks it as being the first node to see this message; this mark is used to detect when the message has circulated the whole ring.

        Contract

         pre     m != null
 post    true        // no postcondition.
        Parameters:
        m - message to be tested.
        Returns:
        true if the message has been marked by this node.

      • hasMarkedMessage

        protected boolean hasMarkedMessage(StandardMessage m)
        return true if this node has marked the message m.

        When a message enters the ring, the first node marks it as being the first node to see this message; this mark is used to detect when the message has circulated the whole ring.

        Contract

         pre     m != null
 post    true        // no postcondition.
        Parameters:
        m - message to be tested.
        Returns:
        true if this node has marked the message m.

      • markMessage

        protected void markMessage(StandardMessage m)
        mark a message as being seen the first time in the ring by the current node.

        When a message enters the ring, the first node marks it as being the first node to see this message; this mark is used to detect when the message has circulated the whole ring.

        Contract

         pre     m != null && !isMarked(m)
 post    true        // no postcondition.
        Parameters:
        m - message to be marked.
